title: Famous Frames Celebrates 28 Years In Business As Hollywood’s Premier Artist Agency
text:
September 09, 2015 at 17:21 PM EDT Famous Frames Celebrates 28 Years In Business As Hollywood’s Premier Artist Agency Famous Frames is a talent agency for storyboard artists, illustrated and animatic producers, and is now celebrating its 28th year in Hollywood, with a showcase of their famous work. 
Filmmaking is an incredible art form because it combines so many forms of artistry, many of which are only ever subconsciously absorbed by the audience. While dynamic action, swelling music and sound, and stunning performances are all essential to a classic, so is an artistic sensibility that comes from a more classical discipline. Famous Frames helps connect filmmakers with visual artists, illustrators and cinematic storyboarders, and is now showcasing the contributions they have made in a new Famous Work section, to celebrate their 28th year in business. 
The Famous Work section features work from Wet Hot American Summer, Furious 7, The Academy Awards, Bates Motel and more. The work includes commercials, TV, video games and more. The work itself is visualized side by the side with the finished product it inspired, showing what a crucial role the artists had in creating the world and the story. 
The section also allows them to show off just a sample of their work, with further categories on the website exploring animatics and CGI, promotional artwork and more. In their 28th year, the company has managed to become the premier source for artists and illustrators working in the film industry. 
A spokesperson for Famous Frames Inc. explained, “Our clientele reads like a who’s who of the advertising and entertainment industries; and our artist’s influence in today’s mass media is evident daily through blockbuster films, prime time TV commercials, print ads, video games and theme park entertainment. We have survived this long because we offer innovation, flexibility and experience. We create lasting relationships with clients, some of whom have been with us since the beginning. Our Famous Works showcase is a great retrospective on some of the many achievements our artists have made since 1988, and we encourage anyone needing these services to contact us .” 
About Famous Frames 
Established in 1988, Famous Frames has held its position as the preeminent talent agency representing artists that specialize in storyboards, shooting boards, comp art, illustration and full-service cinematic, animatic & board-o-matic production. With headquarters in Culver City, California, and a regional office in NYC, Famous Frames represents a roster of 100+ of the world’s top illustrators. 
For more information please visit: http://famousframes.com/
